FileFormat.FormatName: ERDAS Imagine Large Raster Spill File
FileFormat.FormatDescription: .ige files are generated by ERDAS Imagine software, when the RRD file exceeds 2GB (or now 4GB, as suggested by some sources) in size. For these larger projects, two extra files are generated: .img files, and these ige files, which stores the actual image data.

InternalSignature.SignatureName: ERDAS Imagine Large Raster Spill File
